rules_text:
Miracle {3}{W} [i](You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)[/i]
Whenever Shining-Star Brawler becomes tapped, you may exile target card with miracle from your graveyard and the top three cards of your library in a face-down pile. If you do, shuffle that pile and put it back on the top of your library.
